Actions.Name: YearSelector
Actions.Tooltip: Permits the user to choose a value and highlights the last key pressed. This value is then displayed on a YearWitness

Actions.Name: YearWitness
Actions.Tooltip: Shows the year value, pressing it resets the value to 0

Author: Eliott GUEVEL
Description: This plugin shows a value with the YearWitness action and permits to choose from a list of values available from the Property Inspector with the YearSelector action
Name: YearSelectorJS
